gamedescription: A Picaro demo game in which yaps are flapped

rooms.name: The Gift Shop at Jackalope National Park
rooms.description: You find yourself in a run-down gift shop, surrounded by rotating post-card racks and shelves crammed with tchochkes.

items.name: Beach-themed postcard
look: It makes you long to go on vacation.

items.name: Jackalope
attack: the jackalope sends you straight to hell.

talk.name: did you know jackalope milk has large number of purported health benefits, and fetches high prices across the american southwest?

children.name: you are what's wrong with humanity.
won't talk, eh? into the brig with you!
